name: Mohrg
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Create Spawn
traits.desc: Any humanoid creature slain by the mohrg rises as a zombie at the beginning of the mohrg’s next turn. If this occurs, the mohrg regains 10 hit points, and the morhg can immediately make one slam attack as a reaction.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mohrg makes two slam attacks and one attack with its tongue.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled and restrained (escape DC15), and the morhg can’t grapple another creature or use its slam attack.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is paralyzed for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
